product_name: Lorpen Tri Layer Light Ski Socks - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Designed for demanding, technical ski adventures, these soft and warm women's socks feature a 3-layer design with PrimaLoft yarn, superfine nano-washed merino wool and nylon in friction areas.
short_description: Designed for demanding, technical ski adventures, these soft and warm women's socks feature a 3-layer design with PrimaLoft yarn, superfine nano-washed merino wool and nylon in friction areas.
